# Feature Request

## Summary
Describe the feature you would like to see added to a FLYEfit digital product.

## Platform
Select all that apply:
- Mobile App (iOS/Android)
- Website
- API / Integrations
- Kiosk or Access Terminal
- In-gym Digital System

## Problem or Need
Explain the problem this feature solves or the improvement it creates.

## Proposed Solution
Describe how the feature might work or behave.

## Additional Notes
Add screenshots, examples, or user flows if available.

---

*This template covers digital products only.  
For membership or facility matters, contact memberservice@flyefit.ie.*
